name: Super Checkers
description:
Super Checkers (King's Court) is a very addicting strategy game, a twist on the classic Checkers game.

Super Checkers has very simple rules:
•To win, remove all of your opponent's pieces from the middle square (16 lighter tiles in the middle of the board).
•Pieces can jump left, right, up, and down and can even jump over your own pieces.

This app allows you to play different ways:
•Singleplayer against the computer
•Multiplayer via Game Center - Find a friend or a possible match with a random opponent
•Multiplayer - Same Device - Use your iPhone/iPad/iPod as a game board and play against a friend!

The entire game is free, an in-app purchase is available to remove the ads that show during gameplay
